import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Grafico from "./App copy" function CdbInput() { const [investimentos, setInvestimentos] = useState({ cdb1: 0, cdb2: 0, cdb3: 0, acao1: 0, acao2: 0, acao3: 0 }); const handleInputChange = (event, cdbName) => { const { value } = event.target; setInvestimentos(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [cdbName]: value })); }; var cdb01 = document.getElementById("cdb1") const AlterarInput = (check, input) =>{ check.checked === true ? input.disabled = false : input.disabled = true input.disabled ? input.value = '' : input.value = input.value } return (
